ConceptDef.label: Soul
ConceptDef.helpText: Pawns of humanlike intelligence may have a projection in the warp. Humankind calls this projection the Soul.\n The soul gets affected by emotions, thoughts and the tucking of the chaotic warp itself. It is a source of great power, and great danger.

ConceptDef.label: Prayer
ConceptDef.helpText: Pawns may utter prayers during work or combat to honor their faith. These few lines spoken out loud increase favour.\n\nYou can disable the text-overlay and prayers in general via the Souls Tab.

ConceptDef.label: Corruption
ConceptDef.helpText: The malign gods of Chaos prey on any soul they can get their hands on. A pawn who lets his emotions and desires get the better of it gains corruption. Corruption is a gradual process, at the end of which the pawn is forever lost, enslaved to Chaos and an enemy of all forces of order.
